Articles.Content:
I've had KSP for a few weeks now and finally decided to register and get involved on the forums, possibly also learning how not to be utterly terrible (although in my case that may be a lost cause.)

May all your missions not explode in horrible fiery (or watery) death!

Greetings, and welcome to the forums!

There is a tonne to learn, and this is a great place to do it.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! And don't you worry, failure is a viable option in this game. You'll get the hang of stuff pretty quickly if you keep at it!
